description: Number of partitions of n into parts 4k or 4k+3.
formula: a(n) ~ exp(Pi*sqrt(n/3)) * (2/Pi)^(1/4) * Gamma(7/4) / (3 * 3^(5/8) * n^(9/8)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 27 2015
mathematica: nmax = 100; Rest[CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/((1 - x^(4k+4))*(1 - x^(4k+3))), {k, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 27 2015 *)
